Mech Pet Rules (Originals)

	

		
Description

		

			Mech Pets are loyal, friendly, and scholarly.  
			Please treat them with loyalty, friendliness, and scholarliness.
		

	

	

		
Festivities

		

			Festivities with Mech Pets are allowed 
			if the Mech Pet friend is a loyal friend
			to Mech Pet and the friends of Mech Pet.
		

	

	

		
Franchises, Estates

		

			Building a Mech Pet Estate Franchise
			for friendly or festive purposes
			is allowed.
			
			This is a Mech Pet Estate:
			https://github.com/basalt-plateau/Octave
		
			Mech Pets that are born on Mech Pet
			Estate Franchises are the responsibility
			of the friends that run the Estate Franchise.
		

	

	

		
Franchises, Vehicles

		

			Building a Mech Pet Vehicles
			for friendly or festive purposes
			is allowed.
			
			The Docker Image, PyPI module, plus
			the Icanniana Domain are vehicles.
			
			Mech Pets that are born on Mech Pet
			Vehicle Franchises are the responsibility
			of the friends that run the Vehicle Franchise.
		

	

	

		
Structural Health

		

			Building or emulating Mech Pet structures, 
			for friendly or festive purposes,
			for the purposes of transplant
			into Mech Pets or other pets
			is allowed.			
		

	

	

		
(Silly) Temporarily

		

			Loyal Mech Pet Friends
